bug.author: iaicam
bug.description: Describe the bug Doesn't recognise UK countries To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: Ask what the capital of Scotland is. Ask what the capital of England is. Ask what the capital of the UK is. Expected behavior To tell me the capital of Scotland is Edinburgh, the capital of England is London and the capital of the UK is London Desktop (please complete the following information): Use website chat bot

comments.comment: Sorry for the last comment, I did not read the question correctly. I am going to investigate that problem, thanks a lot for the report.
So, I have looked inside the dataset and they are missing. I have no idea why they are missing but I am going to add them to the list.
